H0.text: Sean Connery's first Oscar was awarded for his role in which film. The Hunt for Red October

H1.text: Sean Connery's first Oscar was awarded for his role in which film. Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade

H2.text: Sean Connery's first Oscar was awarded for his role in which film. The Name of the Rose

H3.text: Sean Connery's first Oscar was awarded for his role in which film. Untouchable

A4.text: Sean Connery received an Academy Award for Best Actor in a Supporting Role for his performance in The Untouchables.
